what_is_artivo.question: What is Artivo.Ai and how does it work?
what_is_artivo.answer: Artivo.Ai is an artificial intelligence platform designed to generate high-quality product images in seconds. It allows you to change backgrounds, test different scenarios, and create visually appealing content without photo shoots.

need_design_experience.question: Do I need design experience to use Artivo.Ai?
need_design_experience.answer: No. The platform is easy to use and requires no technical or design knowledge. Just upload an image or write a prompt and Artivo.Ai handles the rest.

what_images_can_i_generate.question: What kind of images can I generate?
what_images_can_i_generate.answer: You can create images for e-commerce, advertising, social media, branding, and fashion. The AI lets you adjust backgrounds, styles, and scenes to match your business needs.

does_it_replace_photographers.question: Does Artivo.Ai replace professional photographers?
does_it_replace_photographers.answer: It doesnâ€™t replace them, but it optimizes the image creation process. You can generate high-quality content faster and at lower cost, reducing your dependency on expensive shoots.

commercial_use.question: Can I use the images for commercial purposes?
commercial_use.answer: Yes. All images generated with Artivo.Ai can be used commercially without restrictions.

advantages_vs_others.question: What are the advantages of Artivo.Ai over other image editors?
advantages_vs_others.answer: Artivo.Ai is a specialized AI image generation tool that lets you: âœ… Automate creation without manual editing. âœ… Optimize content for multiple platforms effortlessly. âœ… Generate variations in seconds to speed up creative workflows.

pricing.question: How much does Artivo.Ai cost?
pricing.answer: We offer different plans based on your image volume and business needs. Check out our pricing page or try Artivo.Ai for free before choosing a plan.

advanced_services.question: What if I need a more advanced service or high image volume?
advanced_services.answer: For high-volume businesses, we offer specialized servers and custom solutions. Contact us to create a plan tailored to your needs.

how_to_start.question: How can I start using Artivo.Ai?
how_to_start.answer: Just sign up, upload an image or write a prompt, and you'll get optimized results in seconds.

support.question: Where can I get support if I have questions?
support.answer: We offer Spanish-language support via our help center. You can contact us anytime with your questions.
